titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 64) setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, and 1998, and against consideration of such conference report.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-49, by Mr. Beilenson.

All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read. The conference report shall be debatable for one hour. The chairman of the Committee on the Budget may submit for printing in the Congressional Record not later than April 1, 1993 the allocations required by section 602(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 25.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 251 - 173 (Roll No. 125).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 250 - 172 (Roll No. 126).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 64 (congressional budget).
